H0.text: What city comes next in this sequence: Atlanta, Sydney, Athens, Beijing. Tokyo

H1.text: What city comes next in this sequence: Atlanta, Sydney, Athens, Beijing. Paris

H2.text: What city comes next in this sequence: Atlanta, Sydney, Athens, Beijing. Los Angeles

H3.text: What city comes next in this sequence: Atlanta, Sydney, Athens, Beijing. GBLON

A4.text: The 2012 Summer Olympics, officially the Games of the XXX Olympiad and also known as London 2012, were an international multi-sport event held from 27 July to 12 August 2012 in London, England.

A5.text: London was selected as the host city at the 117th IOC Session in Singapore on 6 July 2005.

A6.text: London became the first city to host the modern Olympics three times, having previously hosted the Summer Games in 1908 and 1948.

A10.text: Los Angeles will host the Games for the third time in 2028.
